GSD.description:
ipw2x00: Fix potential NULL dereference in libipw_xmit()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 5f7ea274e88c0eeffe6bd6dbf6cf5c479d356af6. For more details please see the references link.
